shortdesc.i: This event is fired by the system. If you want to listen to the event you can do so using the document.addEventListener function and remove the listener using the document.addEventListener function. The onChildCardEndPeek event is fired by the navigator to notify the parent that it is no longer being peeked at.

dd.p: The callback function that will be invoked on the onChildCardEndPeek event.

p.pre:
<script type="text/javascript">

                    function onChildCardEndPeekHandler() {
                        // The Card stopped peeking
                        console.log("I am no longer being peeked at.");
                    }

                    document.addEventListener("onChildCardEndPeek", onChildCardEndPeekHandler);

                </script>
